org.github.xfactory

Class AbstractXFactory<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.github.xfactory.AbstractXFactory<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - POJO or Entity class to build

    public abstract class AbstractXFactory<T>
extends Object
    Abstract class for all factories.
    Author:
    Boris Brodski

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Class<T> getXobjectClass()
      Return class of the object to build.
      abstract void minimal()
      Initialize POJO or entity to satisfy elementary domain constraints.
      Create child objects as needed using xpersistBefore(AbstractXFactory) xpersistAfter(AbstractXFactory) For entities: all database constraints should be fulfilled.

      • minimal

        public abstract void minimal()
        Initialize POJO or entity to satisfy elementary domain constraints.
        Create child objects as needed using
        • xpersistBefore(AbstractXFactory)
        • xpersistAfter(AbstractXFactory)
        For entities: all database constraints should be fulfilled.

      • xobject

        public <E> E xobject(Class<E> clazz)
        Search this and all child XFactories for an object of type clazz.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the type of the xobject to search
        Returns:
        found object or null if no such object was found
